name: Flamemon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Hybrid] in its traits, [Susanoomon], or [Takuya Kanbara] among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolve_effect: [On Deletion] You may play 1 [Takuya Kanbara] from your hand without paying its memory cost.
